desc.before: We keep it simple: you submit your flight, we handle the airline, and you receive compensation under

1.title: Submit your flight
1.body: Enter your flight number, date and route. We run a quick pre-check and confirm whether your case may qualify under EU261.

2.title: We handle the claim
2.body: Add your details and documents. We contact the airline, manage the formal process, and keep you updated by email and on your claim page.

3.title: Get paid
3.body: Once the airline pays, we transfer your compensation to you minus our fee. No result — no fee. You’ll always receive a clear payout summary.

trustRow.lowFee: No win, no fee — low fee

peace.title: We deal with the airline — you relax
peace.body: We handle all communication with the airline for you. No long email threads, no legal maze — just clear status updates so you can focus on life and your next trip.

fee.title: You keep more than with competitors
fee.body: Our fee is among the lowest in the Nordics. Many competitors charge more or hide costs in the fine print. We keep it transparent so you keep a larger share of your compensation.

smart.title: Automated when possible — legal help when needed
smart.body: We use smart tech to speed up straightforward cases. If legal help is needed, we cover it up front and only deduct it if we win. You never pay out of pocket and always know the terms in advance.

footer.pitch: We help passengers get the compensation they’re entitled to under EU261 — with no upfront costs, no hidden fees, and no legal hassle.
